description: Occupying an attractive farmhouse dating back to the 16C, this restaurant boasts an interesting combination of antique elegance and modern style. The cuisine is equally impressive, offering a selection of traditional and innovative dishes that pay close attention to nutritional balance and the healthiness of the combinations of ingredients.
